episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Abducted by a Viking warlord after his father is slain in battle, young Uhtred adopts the Norse way of life until tragedy befalls his new family.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Caught between his scheming uncle Ælfric and pitiless Viking warlord Ubba, Uhtred goes on the run and seeks out Alfred, the man who would be king.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Uhtred allies himself with newly crowned Alfred, but his commitment to the nascent king jeopardizes his bond with Brida.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: King Alfred keeps Uhtred close with a tactical play, but Uhtred soon realizes he's been tricked. Meanwhile, a great battle looms over Wessex.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Uhtred volunteers to attack Danish ships, but challenges Ubba in the process as the Danes threaten Wessex.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Uhtred leads a raiding party to Cornwall on a mission for wealth and independence and attracts the attention of a beautiful sorceress queen.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: As a consequence of their actions in Cornwall, Uhtred and Leofric face off in a death match. The Danes launch an invasion of Wessex.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: A united King Alfred and Uhtred leave the cover of the marshes and make a rallying call to all Saxon armies.

name: Season 1
overview: In Season 1, young Saxon noble Uhtred transforms into a warrior and seeks to regain the lands annexed by his cunning uncle.
